>Tener Announcement for Communication Selector Box (CSB) Headsets
======

### Tender Details

| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS3602448696-Doc3602448755 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3602448696 |
| Publication Date | September 6, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | October 25, 2022, at 2:00pm (EST) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | None |
| Expected Contract End Date | September 6, 2023 |
| Tender Status | Expired |

### Notice Type and Method

* Notice Type: Request for Information (RFI)
* Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Description of the Requirement

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), seeks industry feedback for the provision of Communication Selector Box (CSB) Headsets with Noise Reduction. The Department requires a contractor to supply a total of 14,500 CSB headsets with noise reduction functionality over a period of 5 years.

The CSB headsets are intended for use in high-noise environments and are designed to replace the existing RA-108 headset fleet. The requirement is outlined in this Request for Information (RFI), which is not a bid solicitation and will not result in the issuance of a solicitation or the award of a contract.

### End User Entity

The Department of National Defence (DND) is the end-user entity responsible for utilizing the CSB headsets.

### Important Notes

* All required supporting documentation and response submission must be submitted by October 25, 2022, at 2:00pm (EST).
* Any bids submitted after 2:00pm (EST) will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
